ViewObject.Name: cars04reportVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery:
SELECT checks.employerName, checks.INVOICE_NUMBER, checks.DEPOSIT_SLIP_NUMBER, checks.AGENCY_SOURCE_CODE, checks.REVENUE_SOURCE_CODE, checks.PCA_CODE, checks.FUND, checks.DATA_SOURCE_CODE, checks.PROGRAM_UNIT_CODE, checks.ISSUE_DATE, checks.FISCAL_YEAR, -- checks.INVOICE_AMOUNT, SUM (checks.COURT) COURT, SUM (checks.INTEREST) INTEREST, SUM (checks.COLLECTION_FEE) COLLECTION_FEE, SUM (checks.UNAPPLIED) UNAPPLIED, SUM (checks.POST_JUD_INTEREST) POST_JUD_INTEREST, SUM (checks.NSF) NSF, SUM(CHECKS.BILLED_AMOUNT) BILLED_AMOUNT, SUM (checks.UNBILLED_AMOUNT) UNBILLED_AMOUNT, SUM (checks.PAYMENT_AMOUNT) PAYMENT_AMOUNT, SUM(checks.BILLED_ADJUSTMENT) BILLED_ADJUSTMENT, SUM(checks.UNBILLED_ADJUSTMENT) UNBILLED_ADJUSTMENT, CHECKS.CHECK_DATE, CHECKS.RECEIPT_DATE, CHECKS.CHECK_NUMBER, CHECKS.INDEX_CODE, CHECKS.BATCH_NUMBER, checks.BATCH_SEQUENCE_NUMBER, CHECKS.BATCH_DATE FROM (SELECT DISTINCT NVL (LEGAL_NAME, FIRST_NAME || ' ' || MIDDLE_NAME || ' ' || LAST_NAME) employerName, E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT INVOICE_NUMBER, R.DEPOSIT_SLIP_NUMBER, CASE program_unit_code WHEN 'CALOSHA' THEN '' ELSE AC.AGENCY_SOURCE_CODE END AGENCY_SOURCE_CODE, CASE program_unit_code WHEN 'CALOSHA' THEN '' ELSE AC.REVENUE_SOURCE_CODE END REVENUE_SOURCE_CODE, CASE program_unit_code WHEN 'CALOSHA' THEN '' ELSE FUND_ALLOCATION.PCA_CODE END PCA_CODE, CASE program_unit_code WHEN 'CALOSHA' THEN '' ELSE FUND.FUND END FUND, R.DATA_SOURCE_CODE, ET.PROGRAM_UNIT_CODE, FUNC_GET_ISSUE_DATE (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT) ISSUE_DATE, FUNC_GET_FISCAL_YEAR (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT) FISCAL_YEAR, -- FUNC_GET_CURRENT_BALANCE (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, -- E.EVENT_DATE, -- MIN_DATES.MIN_POSTING_DATE) -- INVOICE_AMOUNT, FUNC_GET_UNBILLED_AMT_AE (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, TRUNC (R.RECEIPT_DATE), 'UNBILLED_COURT_FEE', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) COURT, FUNC_GET_UNBILLED_AMT_AE (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, TRUNC (R.RECEIPT_DATE), 'UNBILLED_INTEREST', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) INTEREST, FUNC_GET_UNBILLED_AMT_AE (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, TRUNC (R.RECEIPT_DATE), 'UNBILLED_COLLECTION_FEE', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) COLLECTION_FEE, FUNC_GET_UNBILLED_AMT_AE (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, TRUNC (R.RECEIPT_DATE), 'UNAPPLIED', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) UNAPPLIED, FUNC_GET_UNBILLED_AMT_AE (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, TRUNC (R.RECEIPT_DATE), 'UNBILLED_POST_JUDGMNT_INT', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) POST_JUD_INTEREST, FUNC_GET_UNBILLED_AMT_AE (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, TRUNC (R.RECEIPT_DATE), 'UNBILLED_NSF_FEE', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) NSF, FUNC_GET_UNBILLED_AMT_AE (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, TRUNC (R.RECEIPT_DATE), 'BILLED', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) BILLED_AMOUNT,
-(FUNC_GET_EFT_ADJUSTMENT(E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT,TRUNC(R.RECEIPT_DATE),'UNBILLED_OTHERS',R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) + FUNC_GET_EFT_ADJUSTMENT(E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT,TRUNC(R.RECEIPT_DATE),'BILLED', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID,R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER)) BILLED_ADJUSTMENT, -FUNC_GET_EFT_ADJUSTMENT(E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT,TRUNC(R.RECEIPT_DATE),'UNAPPLIED',R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) UNBILLED_ADJUSTMENT, TRUNC (EVENT_DATE), TRUNC (R.RECEIPT_DATE) RECEIPT_DATE, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER CHECK_NUMBER, FUNC_GET_UNBILLED_AMT_AE (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, TRUNC (R.RECEIPT_DATE), 'UNBILLED_COURT_FEE', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) + FUNC_GET_UNBILLED_AMT_AE (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, TRUNC (R.RECEIPT_DATE), 'UNBILLED_INTEREST', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) + FUNC_GET_UNBILLED_AMT_AE (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, TRUNC (R.RECEIPT_DATE), 'UNBILLED_COLLECTION_FEE', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) + FUNC_GET_UNBILLED_AMT_AE (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, TRUNC (R.RECEIPT_DATE), 'UNAPPLIED', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) + FUNC_GET_UNBILLED_AMT_AE (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, TRUNC (R.RECEIPT_DATE), 'UNBILLED_POST_JUDGMNT_INT', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) + FUNC_GET_UNBILLED_AMT_AE (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, TRUNC (R.RECEIPT_DATE), 'UNBILLED_NSF_FEE', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) + FUNC_GET_UNBILLED_AMT_AE (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, TRUNC (R.RECEIPT_DATE), 'BILLED', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) - FUNC_GET_EFT_ADJUSTMENT(E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, TRUNC(R.RECEIPT_DATE), 'BILLED', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) - FUNC_GET_EFT_ADJUSTMENT(E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, TRUNC(R.RECEIPT_DATE), 'UNBILLED_OTHERS', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) - FUNC_GET_EFT_ADJUSTMENT(E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, TRUNC(R.RECEIPT_DATE), 'UNAPPLIED', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) PAYMENT_AMOUNT, FUNC_GET_UNBILLED_AMT_AE (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, TRUNC (R.RECEIPT_DATE), 'UNBILLED_COURT_FEE', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) + FUNC_GET_UNBILLED_AMT_AE (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, TRUNC (R.RECEIPT_DATE), 'UNBILLED_INTEREST', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) + FUNC_GET_UNBILLED_AMT_AE (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, TRUNC (R.RECEIPT_DATE), 'UNBILLED_COLLECTION_FEE', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) + FUNC_GET_UNBILLED_AMT_AE (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, TRUNC (R.RECEIPT_DATE), 'UNAPPLIED', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) + FUNC_GET_UNBILLED_AMT_AE (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, TRUNC (R.RECEIPT_DATE), 'UNBILLED_POST_JUDGMNT_INT', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) + FUNC_GET_UNBILLED_AMT_AE (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, TRUNC (R.RECEIPT_DATE), 'UNBILLED_NSF_FEE', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) UNBILLED_AMOUNT, TRUNC (R.DEPOSIT_DATE) CHECK_DATE, AC.INDEX_CODE, BT.BATCH_NUMBER, BT.BATCH_SEQUENCE_NUMBER, TO_DATE (BT.BATCH_DATE, 'yyyy/mm/dd') BATCH_DATE FROM receipt R INNER JOIN accounting_entry AE ON AE.ACCTG_TRANSACTION_ID = R.ACCTG_TRANSACTION_ID INNER JOIN accounting_entry_type AET ON AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_TYPE_ID = AET.ACCTG_ENTRY_TYPE_ID INNER JOIN accounting_code AC ON AC.ACCOUNTING_CODE_ID = AE.ACCOUNTING_CODE_ID LEFT JOIN FUND_ALLOCATION ON (AC.FUND_ALLOCATION_ID = FUND_ALLOCATION.FUND_ALLOCATION_ID) LEFT JOIN FUND ON (FUND_ALLOCATION.FUND_to_ID = FUND.FUND_ID) INNER JOIN acctg_transact_event_assoc ATES ON ATES.ACCTG_TRANSACTION_ID = R.ACCTG_TRANSACTION_ID INNER JOIN EVENT E ON E.EVENT_ID = ATES.EVENT_ID INNER JOIN EVENT_TYPE ET ON (E.EVENT_TYPE_ID = ET.EVENT_TYPE_ID) INNER JOIN participant_role PR ON PR.EVENT_ID = E.EVENT_ID LEFT JOIN organization O ON O.PARTY_ID = PR.PARTY_ID LEFT JOIN PERSON P ON P.PARTY_ID = PR.PARTY_ID LEFT JOIN batch_transaction BT ON AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID = BT.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID WHERE R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE IN ('CHECK', 'EDF', 'USB_LOCK_BOX') AND AET.ACCTG_TRANSACT_CODE IN ('101', '142') -- AND (FUND.EFFECTIVE_END_DATE IS NULL OR FUND.EFFECTIVE_END_DATE >= SYSDATE) -- AND (PR.EFFECTIVE_END_DATE IS NULL OR PR.EFFECTIVE_END_DATE >= SYSDATE)
union SELECT DISTINCT NVL (LEGAL_NAME, FIRST_NAME || ' ' || MIDDLE_NAME || ' ' || LAST_NAME) employerName, E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT INVOICE_NUMBER, R.DEPOSIT_SLIP_NUMBER, CASE program_unit_code WHEN 'CALOSHA' THEN '' ELSE AC.AGENCY_SOURCE_CODE END AGENCY_SOURCE_CODE, CASE program_unit_code WHEN 'CALOSHA' THEN '' ELSE AC.REVENUE_SOURCE_CODE END REVENUE_SOURCE_CODE, CASE program_unit_code WHEN 'CALOSHA' THEN '' ELSE FUND_ALLOCATION.PCA_CODE END PCA_CODE, CASE program_unit_code WHEN 'CALOSHA' THEN '' ELSE FUND.FUND END FUND, R.DATA_SOURCE_CODE, ET.PROGRAM_UNIT_CODE, FUNC_GET_ISSUE_DATE (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT) ISSUE_DATE, FUNC_GET_FISCAL_YEAR (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT) FISCAL_YEAR, --- FUNC_GET_CURRENT_BALANCE (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, --- E.EVENT_DATE, --- MIN_DATES.MIN_POSTING_DATE) --- INVOICE_AMOUNT, FUNC_GET_UNBILLED_AMT_AE (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, TRUNC (R.RECEIPT_DATE), 'UNBILLED_COURT_FEE', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) COURT, FUNC_GET_UNBILLED_AMT_AE (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, TRUNC (R.RECEIPT_DATE), 'UNBILLED_INTEREST', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) INTEREST, FUNC_GET_UNBILLED_AMT_AE (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, TRUNC (R.RECEIPT_DATE), 'UNBILLED_COLLECTION_FEE', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) COLLECTION_FEE, FUNC_GET_UNBILLED_AMT_AE (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, TRUNC (R.RECEIPT_DATE), 'UNAPPLIED', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) UNAPPLIED, FUNC_GET_UNBILLED_AMT_AE (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, TRUNC (R.RECEIPT_DATE), 'UNBILLED_POST_JUDGMNT_INT', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) POST_JUD_INTEREST, FUNC_GET_UNBILLED_AMT_AE (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, TRUNC (R.RECEIPT_DATE), 'UNBILLED_NSF_FEE', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) NSF, FUNC_GET_UNBILLED_AMT_AE (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, TRUNC (R.RECEIPT_DATE), 'BILLED', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) BILLED_AMOUNT,
-(FUNC_GET_EFT_ADJUSTMENT(E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT,TRUNC(R.RECEIPT_DATE),'UNBILLED_OTHERS',R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) + FUNC_GET_EFT_ADJUSTMENT(E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT,TRUNC(R.RECEIPT_DATE),'BILLED', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID,R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER)) BILLED_ADJUSTMENT, -FUNC_GET_EFT_ADJUSTMENT(E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT,TRUNC(R.RECEIPT_DATE),'UNAPPLIED',R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) UNBILLED_ADJUSTMENT, TRUNC (EVENT_DATE), TRUNC (R.RECEIPT_DATE) RECEIPT_DATE, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER CHECK_NUMBER, FUNC_GET_UNBILLED_AMT_AE (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, TRUNC (R.RECEIPT_DATE), 'UNBILLED_COURT_FEE', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) + FUNC_GET_UNBILLED_AMT_AE (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, TRUNC (R.RECEIPT_DATE), 'UNBILLED_INTEREST', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) + FUNC_GET_UNBILLED_AMT_AE (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, TRUNC (R.RECEIPT_DATE), 'UNBILLED_COLLECTION_FEE', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) + FUNC_GET_UNBILLED_AMT_AE (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, TRUNC (R.RECEIPT_DATE), 'UNAPPLIED', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) + FUNC_GET_UNBILLED_AMT_AE (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, TRUNC (R.RECEIPT_DATE), 'UNBILLED_POST_JUDGMNT_INT', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) + FUNC_GET_UNBILLED_AMT_AE (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, TRUNC (R.RECEIPT_DATE), 'UNBILLED_NSF_FEE', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) + FUNC_GET_UNBILLED_AMT_AE (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, TRUNC (R.RECEIPT_DATE), 'BILLED', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) - FUNC_GET_EFT_ADJUSTMENT (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, TRUNC(R.RECEIPT_DATE), 'BILLED', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) - FUNC_GET_EFT_ADJUSTMENT (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, TRUNC(R.RECEIPT_DATE), 'UNBILLED_OTHERS', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) - FUNC_GET_EFT_ADJUSTMENT (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, TRUNC(R.RECEIPT_DATE), 'UNAPPLIED', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) PAYMENT_AMOUNT, FUNC_GET_UNBILLED_AMT_AE (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, TRUNC (R.RECEIPT_DATE), 'UNBILLED_COURT_FEE', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) + FUNC_GET_UNBILLED_AMT_AE (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, TRUNC (R.RECEIPT_DATE), 'UNBILLED_INTEREST', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) + FUNC_GET_UNBILLED_AMT_AE (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, TRUNC (R.RECEIPT_DATE), 'UNBILLED_COLLECTION_FEE', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) + FUNC_GET_UNBILLED_AMT_AE (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, TRUNC (R.RECEIPT_DATE), 'UNAPPLIED', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) + FUNC_GET_UNBILLED_AMT_AE (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, TRUNC (R.RECEIPT_DATE), 'UNBILLED_POST_JUDGMNT_INT', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) + FUNC_GET_UNBILLED_AMT_AE (E.AR_ROOT_DOCUMENT, TRUNC (R.RECEIPT_DATE), 'UNBILLED_NSF_FEE', R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE, AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID, R.RECEIPT_CONTROL_NUMBER) UNBILLED_AMOUNT, TRUNC (R.DEPOSIT_DATE) CHECK_DATE, AC.INDEX_CODE, BT.BATCH_NUMBER, BT.BATCH_SEQUENCE_NUMBER, TO_DATE (BT.BATCH_DATE, 'yyyy/mm/dd') BATCH_DATE FROM receipt R INNER JOIN accounting_transaction_assoc ata ON r.ACCTG_TRANSACTION_ID = ata.ACCTG_TRANSACTION_FROM_ID INNER JOIN acctg_transact_event_assoc ATES ON ATES.ACCTG_TRANSACTION_ID =ata.ACCTG_TRANSACTION_TO_ID INNER JOIN accounting_entry AE ON ATES.ACCTG_TRANSACTION_ID =AE.ACCTG_TRANSACTION_ID INNER JOIN accounting_entry_type AET ON AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_TYPE_ID = AET.ACCTG_ENTRY_TYPE_ID INNER JOIN accounting_code AC ON AC.ACCOUNTING_CODE_ID = AE.ACCOUNTING_CODE_ID
LEFT JOIN FUND_ALLOCATION ON (AC.FUND_ALLOCATION_ID = FUND_ALLOCATION.FUND_ALLOCATION_ID) LEFT JOIN FUND ON (FUND_ALLOCATION.FUND_to_ID = FUND.FUND_ID) INNER JOIN acctg_transact_event_assoc ATES ON ATES.ACCTG_TRANSACTION_ID = R.ACCTG_TRANSACTION_ID INNER JOIN EVENT E ON E.EVENT_ID = ATES.EVENT_ID INNER JOIN EVENT_TYPE ET ON (E.EVENT_TYPE_ID = ET.EVENT_TYPE_ID) INNER JOIN participant_role PR ON PR.EVENT_ID = E.EVENT_ID LEFT JOIN organization O ON O.PARTY_ID = PR.PARTY_ID LEFT JOIN PERSON P ON P.PARTY_ID = PR.PARTY_ID LEFT JOIN batch_transaction BT ON AE.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID = BT.ACCTG_ENTRY_ID
WHERE R.RECEIPT_TYPE_CODE IN ('CHECK', 'EDF', 'USB_LOCK_BOX') AND AET.ACCTG_TRANSACT_CODE IN ('101', '142') -- AND (FUND.EFFECTIVE_END_DATE IS NULL or FUND.EFFECTIVE_END_DATE >= sysdate) -- AND ( PR.EFFECTIVE_END_DATE IS NULL or PR.EFFECTIVE_END_DATE >= sysdate )
) checks --where PAYMENT_AMOUNT > 0 -- and CHECKS.RECEIPT_DATE > to_date('5/1/2017', 'mm/dd/yyyy') -- and program_unit_code ='EV' --AND checks.DATA_SOURCE_CODE ='SIMS' GROUP BY checks.employerName, checks.INVOICE_NUMBER, checks.DEPOSIT_SLIP_NUMBER, checks.AGENCY_SOURCE_CODE, checks.REVENUE_SOURCE_CODE, checks.PCA_CODE, checks.FUND, checks.DATA_SOURCE_CODE, checks.PROGRAM_UNIT_CODE, checks.ISSUE_DATE, checks.FISCAL_YEAR, -- checks.INVOICE_AMOUNT, CHECKS.CHECK_DATE, CHECKS.RECEIPT_DATE, CHECKS.CHECK_NUMBER, CHECKS.INDEX_CODE, CHECKS.BATCH_NUMBER, CHECKS.BATCH_SEQUENCE_NUMBER, CHECKS.BATCH_DATE ORDER BY RECEIPT_DATE DESC
